TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., The Austin Papers, (Austin: University of Texas Press, 1927), 3 vols., Vol 3, pp. 165
TEI.2.document_title: Gail Borden, Jr. to Stephen F Austin, 10-08-1835

barker_notes.barker_summary: Notifying him of election to the consultation.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., The Austin Papers, (Austin: University of Texas Press, 1927), 3 vols., Vol 3, pp. 165

div1.p: Notifying him of election to the consultation.

p.location_mentioned: Committee Room San Felipe de Austin

div1.p: This is to notify you, that by the returns made to the committee of Austin you are elected a delegate to represent this Jurisdiction in the general Consulation to convene on the 15th instant.
Chairman pro tem of the Committee of Safety.
[Addressed:] Col. S. F. Austin Army of Texas.
